attributes.action: hold a referendum on any future treaty or other agreement with the European Union and to demand a full accounting of its finances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned, having noted the aspirations of the EU to assume ever greater control over national affairs, the lack of accountability to the general public, the apparent lack of financial control displayed by the EU and the apparent intent to ignore the rejection by referendum of the proposed Constitution by the voters of France, hereby petition the Prime Minister:

1) That no further power of any description over any British subject, company, or element of Government be granted to the EU by any method unless such grant be approved in referendum by an outright majority of those subjects who would be entitled to vote in a General Election upon the day of the referendum.

2) That the EU shall produce by Midday GMT, 31st October 2007 a full accounting of its finances for the year ending 30th April 2007, that such an account be made completely and freely available to any British subject as shall ask for it, that this accounting be debated in Parliament and that failure to comply be met with the suspension of all payments to the EU until such accounting is submitted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
